dublin_core.dcvalue: Panel Lessons About Scale Join this panel as they present findings and lessons learned across the spectrum of an SMS reminder and incentive program for immunization services from development to evaluation to scale Presentations will be ordered along the continuum of a scaled program to take you on a journey from concept and development to pilot phase to a randomized controlled trial to a scaled program with presenters focusing on the roadblocks results and lessons learned specific to their section Presented by Dr Dustin Gibson Assistant Scientist Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health International Vaccine Acccess Center
The Mobile Solutions for Immunization (M-SIMU) Trial
